fields.name: DisplayTxtNowGoToWOCreateSR_NoFurtherWork
fields.fieldText:
Your service appointment status has been updated to Job Closure.

To continue, click Next, Finish and scroll down to Create Service Report.

*A service report is required to update your status to Visit Complete.

screens.name: Screen_give_a_description_of_the_Works_carried_out
screens.label: Please now give a description of the Works carried out:

fields.name: DisplayTxtGiveDescriptionOfWorksCarriedOut
fields.fieldText: Please now give a description of the works carried out:

fields.name: LTxtJob_Report_for_Customer
fields.fieldText: Job report for customer (required):

fields.name: LTextNotes_for_the_Office
fields.fieldText: Notes for the office (optional):

fields.name: ChkBoxAre_further_works_required
fields.fieldText: Are further works required?

fields.name: DisplayTxtAccounttypeCredit
fields.fieldText: As this a {!var_AccountData.Account_Type__c} customer an email has been sent to the client requesting payment. The client has 30 days to pay.

fields.name: DisplayTxtAccounttypeKey
fields.fieldText:
As this a credit customer an email has been sent to the client requesting payment. The client has 30 days to pay.

The service appointment status has been updated to Visit Complete.

fields.name: Short_Summary_of_Further_Works_Required
fields.fieldText: Short summary of further works required:

fields.name: PicklistPlease_select_Trade_Required
fields.fieldText: Please select trade required

fields.name: DisplayTxtNoPhotoCompletedWork
fields.fieldText:
An image of the completed work is required.

Please press Next to add.

screens.name: ScreenServ_Appt_Status_Updated_to_In_Transit
screens.label: Serv Appt Status Updated to In Transit

fields.name: DisplayTxtServApptstatusInTransit
fields.fieldText:
Your service appointment status has been updated to In Transit

Your estimate start time is: {!var_AssignedResourceData.NOW_Add_Estimated_Travel_Time__c}

Your estimate end time is: {!var_AssignedResourceData.NOW_Add_Estimated_Travel_Time_Duration__c}

(Duration of {!var_WorkOrderData.Duration} hours)

screens.name: ScreenServ_Appt_Status_Updated_to_On_Site
screens.label: Serv Appt Status Updated to On Site

fields.name: DisplayTxtServApptStatusOnSite
fields.fieldText: Your service appointment status has been updated to On Site

screens.name: ScreenServ_Appt_Status_will_be_Updated_to_In_Transit_Confirm
screens.label: Serv Appt Status will be Updated to In Transit Confirm

fields.name: DisplayTxtServApptstatusInTransitConfirm
fields.fieldText: Please select In Transit and click next

fields.name: RadbtnPlease_confirm_InTransit
fields.fieldText: Please confirm:

screens.name: ScreenServ_Appt_Status_will_be_Updated_to_Job_Closure_Confirm
screens.label: Serv Appt Status will be Updated to Job Closure Confirm

fields.name: DisplayTxtServApptStatusJobClosureConfirm
fields.fieldText:
Please select Job Closure and click next

*If you do this you wont be able to raise any purchase orders

fields.name: RadbtnPlease_confirm_JobClosure
fields.fieldText: Please confirm:

screens.name: ScreenServ_Appt_Status_will_be_Updated_to_On_Site_Confirm
screens.label: Serv Appt Status will be Updated to On Site Confirm

fields.name: DisplayTxtServApptstatusOnSiteConfirm
fields.fieldText: Please select On Site and click next

fields.name: RadbtnPlease_confirm_OnSite
fields.fieldText: Please confirm:

screens.name: ScreenServ_Appt_Status_will_be_Updated_to_Visit_Complete_Confirm_NoPayment
screens.label: Serv Appt Status will be Updated to Visit Complete Confirm_NoPayment

fields.name: DisplayTxtNoPaymentReq
fields.fieldText: *No payment is required as this is not the last Work Order or last Service Appointment for this Job.

fields.name: RadbtnPlease_confirm_VisitComplete_0
fields.fieldText: Please confirm:

screens.name: ScreenServ_Appt_Status_will_be_Updated_to_Visit_Complete_Last_WO_and_Last_SA
screens.label: Serv Appt Status will be Updated to Visit Complete Last WO and Last SA

fields.name: RadbtnPlease_confirm_VisitComplete_Last_WO_and_Last_SA
fields.fieldText: Please confirm:

screens.name: ScreenService_Appt_Updated_to_Visit_Complete_Confirmation
screens.label: Service Appt Updated to Visit Complete Confirmation

fields.name: DisplayTxtServiceApptUpdatedVisitCompleteConfirmation
fields.fieldText:
The service appointment status has now been updated to Visit Complete.

Please press Next and Finish.

fields.name: DisplayTxtServiceReportNotFound
fields.fieldText: You cannot take a payment without a service report. To continue, click Next, Finish and scroll down to Create Service Report.

fields.name: DisplayTxtServiceReportNotFound_0
fields.fieldText: You cannot take a payment without a service report. To continue, click Next, Finish and scroll down to Create Service Report.

fields.name: DisplayTxtVisitComplete
fields.fieldText:
The Service Appointment is already in a Status of Visit Complete.

To make any changes now you will need to contact the office.
